oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: "Time To Do Some Poking Around"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Political cartoon interpreting the investigation into Highlander Folk School in Grundy County for communist activity.

The Jack Knox Papers, 1932-1978, represent the work of a noted conservative political cartoonist who drew for the Nashville Banner newspaper. Mr. Knox retired in 1975 after 29 years with the Nashville Banner.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Knox, Jack, 1910-1985
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Communism; Civil rights; Governmental investigations
